title: SciFiNow - December 2017 (gnv64)
description: SciFiNow - December 2017 English | 116 pages | True PDF | 32.7 mb PORTAL 08 The Orville - Seth MacFarlane tells us about his hilarious SF series. 12 Beyond Skyline - Inside the most surprising sequel of the year. FEATURES 18 Geek 100 - From Avengers and Wonder Woman 2 to Doctor Who and Good Omens, it’s our massive preview of 2018 and beyond. 50 Doctor Who Christmas Special - On set for the fi nal farewell to Peter Capaldi’s Doctor and Steven Moffat, and the return of an old face… 56 Coco - Pixar’s sweet-hearted latest heads for the Land Of The Dead. 58 Karen Gillan - The genre star talks Jumanji, Avengers and life as a geek icon. 60 Insidious: The Last Key - Is the latest visit to The Further the most terrifying yet? 64 Hard Sun - We sit down with Luther creator Neil Cross and star Jim Sturgess to talk about their apocalyptic nightmare series. 68 Black Mirror - From page to screen, we fi nd out exactly what goes into bringing Charlie Brooker’s vision to life. REVIEWS 74 Justice League - Is DC’s team-up better than the haters think? 76 Better Watch Out - Tis the season for festive fears… 81 Game Of Thrones: Season 7 - Setting the stage for the end of an era. 82 Red Dwarf XII - The boys from the Dwarf are back. Plus: Lu Over The Wall, Eyes Of Laura Mars, Carrie, American Horror - Story: Cult and more… BOOK CLUB 88 Joe Hill - The Strange Weather author talks real-world fears and the joy of lean, mean thrillers. 92 Charles Stross - We talk to the author of Dark State about the latest chapter in his Merchant Princes saga. Plus: All the latest book and graphic novel reviews. TIMEWARP 94 Dark Shadows - The complete guide to the supernatural soap opera sensation. 102 The Muppet Christmas Carol - The heartwarming story behind a holiday classic. 106 RoboCop - Paying tribute to 30 years of the future of law enforcement. Plus: Scream https://s18.postimg.org/p8cn59x55/Sci_Fi_Now_-_December_2017.jpg
